items.sentence: Both Tom and Mary were in Boston all last summer.
Couldn't you wait for everyone else to get ready?
I've already told you that I don't want you here.
Do you think that Tom could find Boston on a map?
Tom has been planning to do that for a long time.
That's what we need to try to convince Tom to do.
I guess that we won't be seeing Tom anytime soon.
I have a lot of things I want to do before I die.
I think that it was Tom I saw getting on the bus.
I don't want you to think that I don't mean that.
